statements: SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data ORDER BY contribution_date DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE expense_category = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT contributor_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM campaign_finance_data GROUP BY contributor_name;

SELECT contributor_name, expense_category, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY contributor_name, expense_category ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE contribution_date >= '2022-01-01' AND expense_category = 'Advertising' ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT contributor_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contribution FROM campaign_finance_data GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING total_contribution > 5000 ORDER BY total_contribution DESC;
SELECT expense_category, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' GROUP BY expense_category ORDER BY avg_expense DESC;

SELECT contributor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM campaign_finance_data WHERE expense_amount > 500 AND contribution_amount > 100 GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING total_transactions >= 3 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contribution_id = 1;
SELECT contributor_name, contribution_amount FROM contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_type = 'Travel' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT expense_type, expense_amount, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM contributions ORDER BY contribution_date ASC, contribution_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE contribution_amount > 1000 ORDER BY contribution_date DESC
SELECT contributor_name, SUM(contribution_amount) AS total_contributions FROM contributions GROUP BY contributor_name ORDER BY total_contributions DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY expense_date ASC
SELECT contributor_name, AVG(contribution_amount) AS average_contribution FROM contributions GROUP BY contributor_name HAVING average_contribution > 500 ORDER BY average_contribution DESC
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE expense_type LIKE '%Office%' OR expense_type LIKE '%Travel%' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM contributions;
SELECT contributor_id, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT expense_id, description FROM expenses WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT campaign_id, candidate_name FROM campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT contributor_id, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount = 500 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY contributor_id
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE description LIKE '%travel%' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT campaign_id, candidate_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT contributor_id, amount FROM contributions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contributor_name, contributor_type FROM contributors WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM contributions GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT contributor_id, amount, campaign_id FROM expenses WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY amount ASC, date DESC;
SELECT c.campaign_name, SUM(co.amount) AS total_contributions FROM campaigns c JOIN contributions co ON c.campaign_id = co.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_id;
SELECT contributor_name, contributor_type FROM contributors WHERE contributor_type = 'Individual' AND address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY contributor_name;
SELECT * FROM contributions c JOIN campaigns p ON c.campaign_id = p.campaign_id WHERE p.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM contributions ORDER BY amount DESC, date_contributed ASC
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT contributor_name, amount, date_contributed FROM contributions WHERE contributor_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM donors WHERE address IS NOT NULL
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns
SELECT * FROM contributions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_contributed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contributor_name, amount FROM contributions WHERE date_contributed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date < CURDATE();
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM candidates ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT donor_name, email, address FROM donors WHERE donor_id IN (SELECT donor_id FROM contributions WHERE amount > 5000);
